bibl.title: Some Peculiarities of Greek and Coptic Epigraphy from Nubia.
bibl.note: The mains aspects to be considered are phonetics / phonology and morphology.

bibl.title: with the assistance of Maarten KERSTEN and Carolien VAN ZOEST, Coptic Studies on the Treshold of a New Millennium. Proceedings of the Seventh International Congress of Coptic Studies. Leiden, 27 August - 2 September 2000. I

bibl.seg: SATZINGER Helmut, Some Peculiarities of Greek and Coptic Epigraphy from Nubia.

Mat IMMERZEEL and Jacques VAN DER VLIET (Edd.), with the assistance of Maarten KERSTEN and Carolien VAN ZOEST, Coptic Studies on the Treshold of a New Millennium. Proceedings of the Seventh International Congress of Coptic Studies. Leiden, 27 August - 2 September 2000. I = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 133 (Leuven, 2004) pp. 529-535.
The mains aspects to be considered are phonetics / phonology and morphology.
